content:
@Qi Yang - FYI: I moved the mCODE STU1 to OMOP gap analysis from our meeting minutes to the Artifacts page. https://confluence.hl7.org/download/attachments/81018297/mCODE%20Data%20Dictionary%20and%20OMOP%20mapping%20v1.2.xlsx?version=1&modificationDate=1642694291570&api=v2
Also, now that mCODE STU2 is officially published (http://hl7.org/fhir/us/mcode/), I can start migrating your existing mappings to the new data dictionary. I can post that one prior to our next meeting on Jan 27.
